features: Washing and Drying : This folding washing machine is integrated with washing and drying, multipurpose, small in size, but fully functional. Foldable washing machine + Blue Light & Drain basket,which is very suitable for washing childrens clothing, underwear, socks, towels, etc.effectively remove,and make your clothes clean.

Foldable Washing Machine : This washing machine is foldable that you can easily take it with you, suitable for both home and travel use.It is suitable for student dorms, apartments, senior homes, traveling, camping, business trip etc.

Strong Stain Removal : This washing machine provides all round rubbing, positive and negative hand washing; with quick washing, to achieve strong stain removal effect.Coming with blue ray,It is really suitable for washing underwear or baby clothes. Keep healthy for you and your family.

Food Grade & Durable Material : Our mini portable washing machine use TPE material, more resistant to aging, yellowing, high temperature and corrosion. Our portable washer machine of food-grade silicone material is a wonderful choice for your personal items, baby items, pets items, fruits and vegetables.

Environmental Protection : The washer machines will send out vibration waves to remove more effectively. Energy-saving and environmental protection, saving water and electricity.Our small washing machine will be an amazing gift for people who love cleanliness, love food-healthy, travel frequently, live in school and family with babies, pets, patients.The bottom of the product should not be contaminated with water

How to use: Step 1: Plug in the power supply . Step 2: Press the bottom button, and after 2 seconds, the washing machine will start.After the machine is turned on and the mode is selected, do not touch it anymore. It will automatically clean.

Step 3: Select the cleaning time. There are three icons from left to right. The first icon has a standard washing time of 10 minutes, the second icon has a soft washing time of 15 minutes, and the third icon has a half dehydration time of 2 minutes (the icon is lit to indicate which cleaning mode has been selected). Short press the bottom button to change to different cleaning modes. For more details, please refer to the video explanation
Step 4: After cleaning, please press the bottom button. After 2 seconds, the washing machine will stop . Note: If you want to repeat the cleaning, you can repeat the above operation

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Foldable Washing Machine The portable washing machine provides a drain pipe and a collapsible drain basket, compact and easy to carry, it is an ideal choice for your apartment, dormitory, RV, travel or camping! It is also your ideal gift selection.

It is the best choice of apartment gifts for friends or family.The portable washing machine is lightweight and convenient, you can take it for camping or travelling. Blue light design with 360 degree dual blue light illumination, achieving deep cleaning and providing you with a more reassuring personal experience. Upgraded 8L High Capacity Mini Washer,Washing your underwear separately from other clothes. The mini washer is the best choice to wash your underwear.

Just one touching button to control the washing machine.The folding design can reduce storage space. High power motor, stubborn stains without residue, high torque, fast speed, driving the washing rhythm of the wave wheel, more powerful cleaning, energy-saving, low consumption, and durable. Separate drainage basket, integrated with washing and stripping, gently separates residual moisture from clothing, avoiding violent dehydration that can cause clothing to pull and deform.

This washing machine provides all-round imitation hand scrubbing, precise washing speed to achieve strong decontamination effect. It is very suitable for washing small clothes such as baby clothes, underwear or socks, Stay healthy for you and your family.
Not Recommended: Jeans, Long Skirts, Bathrobes and Other Large Clothes.

Notes: 1.It is not suitable for washing large and heavy clothes such as jeans. 2.The bottom of the product is not waterproof, please do not put the bottom into water. 3.When washing clothes, please do not put too much water. If you put too much water, when the washing machine is started, the momentum of the water will flush the cover open, causing the water to splash everywhere.

Name Folding washing machine/Upgraded Mini Portable Washing Machine Cleaning capacity 8L Rated voltage 12V Waterproof grade IPX4 Dimensions: (before folding) 29.5 * 29.9 * 29 cm (after folding) 29.5 * 29.5 * 14.5 cm Package includes: Folding washing machine * 1; Drain basket * 1; USA standard plug * 1; Instructions * 1

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best Little Washing Machine
reviews.reviewText: I got this to wash my underwear. It is surprisingly fast and efficient. I has removed stains from shirts (think salsa from your taco tuesday). It is small, but you can fit a xl cotton shirt and it will clean it better that my regular washing machine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Can’t wash over one item
reviews.reviewText: The bucket is super small, but the force was super hard so the water would splash everywhere and the bucket would tip over all the time. I put in two hands towels and it couldn’t wash it without making a mess. The smaller bucket inside that’s supposed to help you rent out or fling out the excess water does not work at all. The little bucket inside is unable to stay on the hinges, so it just turns without flinging the water because the bucket doesn’t turn with it. It basically doesn’t do anything that it claims that I can do so it’s a waste of money to try to bite us and it takes forever for it to get to get to you

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This held less than expected, so did not work well for our original purpose. However, I now use it for my small hand wash items and it works well enough. The spin basket is a little annoying-very small and often spins off it’s tracks.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Ojo con esta lavadora
reviews.reviewText: Es un engaño, uno, la lavadora funciona solo para piezas pequeñas, dos ,la secadora no seca casi nada, y 3, dejó de funcionar al mes y 10 días, venciendo la fecha de devolución, de un día para otro, creo que lo han hecho con este fin ,y 4 ,vale más cara que en tema, shein ,el doble de estas otras aplicaciones para ser tan mala ,no lo compraré jamás, doy 5 estrellas para que salga mi comentario arriba

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars I've had better
reviews.reviewText: A lot of things went wrong {no instruction in english even though i requested one, showed up a few days late, buttons moved like crazy and stops working} but oh well. Be careful buying it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Do not buy
reviews.reviewText: I wish I read the reviews more before I purchased this item. It gets one star because I can’t give it a zero. It literally just stops working out of nowhere. It is not worth the money I wish I would have bought a different machine from a different seller.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It’s perfect for small items like socks and underwear! Otherwise, it’s not too good. The middle spin bucket won’t come off so now I can barely wash anything. It also makes a very annoying squeaking sound.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Glad I bought it
reviews.reviewText: It’s very useful, I brought it for my daughter for her dorm room

A mini máquina de lavar é ótima para pequenas roupas, lavo os meus panos de prato. O motor tem a potencial para lavar dois panos pratos no máximo, cabe uns 4 litros água pois se não pode derramar para fora. Parece um brinquedo!
Na centrifugação dependendo da roupa a máquina fica pulando... mesmo que seja uma peça só... por exemplo um maiô
Muito útil para lavagem de roupas pequenas, recomendo!

Comprei para utilizar em meu motorhome, principalmente para longas distâncias. Meses viajando, precisamos de alguma estratégia para manter nossas roupas limpas. Para roupas íntimas, camisetas básicas e shorts cumpre seu propósito de lavar, desde que você coloque poucas peças e muita água. Camisetas de manga longa e calças, mesmo os modelos mais leves como de tactel, forçam demasiadamente o aparelho. Não tem um grande poder de centrifugação, deixou bastante a desejar nesse quesito. Em suma, pode ser utilizado para limpar algumas poucas roupas íntimas, shorts ou camisetas do dia a dia, em pequenas quantidades, no entanto não espere um grande desempenho.
